Every place you look in HK will be the same, extremely LITTLE.

The location is great, restaurants and bars near.

I can deal with no changing sheets but not to come and take the trash from the bathroom is just crazy. The trash of bathroom and kitchen were full. It seems the host expects people to take out the trash, so why are we charge an expensive cleaning fee?!
